name: Deeper Into Enemy Lines!
description:
Deeper into enemy lines is a 8bit style game under the 1700th era with muskets and line infantry. The game was made for the game jab Ludum dare 48 with the theme "Deeper and Deeper".

How to play

Select your blue soldiers and then select the enemy green soldiers. After you have given all your regiments a target you can press the execute order button. This will trigger your men to fire at the enemy.

You can upgrade your units after each time to get more health, better accuracy, enable double line firing and increase initiative of your men.

Now order your men to fight your way through the enemy lines and achieve victory.
